title: Butternut Squash Soup

title: Bistro Salad with Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: 2 very large carrots, cut into 1” chunks, 3 large parsnips, cut into 1” chunks, 1/2 large celery root (celeriac), peeled, cut into 1” chunks, 1/4 cup olive oil, Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, 1 garlic clove, grated, Small pinch of smoked paprika, 4 large eggs, 1 1/2 pounds frisée and/or arugula, cut or torn into bite-size pieces, washed, 4 tbsp Whole Grain Mustard Walnut Vinaigrette (click here for recipe), 1/2 cup toasted almonds, coarsely chopped, Flaky sea salt (for serving)
